reviewText:
The subject matter
("American Monsters: Werewolves, Wildmen and Sea Creatures") is of ex-
treme interest to me. The price is reasonable, and I have eagerly been a-
waiting its delivery to my Bavarian farm.

I've enjoyed these various [mythical] creatures, and welcome any/all ex-
plainations as to their validity in fact. Looks like all of MY favorite monsters
are covered except Dracula... or, is HE considered a wildman?
